properties.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:30AM PST until January 17 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento CA
properties.description:
...Hazardous mountain travel expected later today into early
Friday...

.A winter storm is expected to bring moderate to heavy snow to the
mountains and upper foothills later today into Friday. Mountain
travel during this time will be very difficult with reduced
visibility, chain controls, and possible road closures. Gusty
winds may bring periods of whiteout conditions. Plan ahead and
continue to monitor the forecast.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Travel will be very difficult to
impossible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, with
locally heavier accumulations, are expected.

* WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County.

* WHEN...6 PM today to 6 AM Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels lowering to 1500 to 2000 feet
by Thursday night.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow means there will be snow covered
roads and limited visibilities. Travel is not recommended while
the warning is in effect. If you must travel, keep an extra
flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an
emergency.The latest road conditions for the state you are
calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET
